careers.name: Apothecary
careers.description: Skilled in chemistry and concoctions, you create and sell medicine of all kinds

careers.name: Engineer
careers.description: You create machines and constructions both useful and bizarre, and often downright deadly

careers.name: Lawyer
careers.description: You navigate treacherous legal systems, defending clients and prosecuting the guilty

careers.name: Nun
careers.description: You are devoted to the service of your deity, having sworn vows for a life of service

careers.name: Physician
careers.description: With a strong stomach and steady hand, you practice the art of medicine, striving to save lives

careers.name: Priest
careers.description: You carry the word of your god, tending to the spiritual needs of the masses

careers.name: Scholar
careers.description: You dedicate your life to the pursuit and study of knowledge, wherever that may take you

careers.name: Wizard
careers.description: Feared and distrusted by the citizens of the Empire, you legally wield powerful and dangerous magic

careers.name: Agitator
careers.description: Charismatic and articulate, you champion your cause in the face of establishment opposition

careers.name: Artisan
careers.description: A skilled craftsperson, you take pride in your work, creating products for sale and commission

careers.name: Beggar
careers.description: Street-smart, you make a living from the charity of others using persuasion and charm

careers.name: Investigator
careers.description: Perceptive and suspicious, you probe deep into the heart of any crime, and find answers

careers.name: Merchant
careers.description: Shrewd and numerate, you buy low to sell high, making more money than most will ever see

careers.name: Rat Catcher
careers.description: You spare civilisation from being overrun by vermin with help from your trusty, canine companion

tiers.name: Exterminator
trappings: Sack of Poisoned Bait (10 doses of Heartkill)

careers.name: Townsman
careers.description: Ambitious and socially mobile, you are the hardworking glue that holds urban society together

tiers.name: Burgomeister
trappings: Large Townhouse with Gardens and Servants

careers.name: Watchman
careers.description: You maintain the peace and keep the rabble in line so your town doesn't descend into anarchy

tiers.name: Watch Captain
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Advisor
careers.description: Wise and well-informed, you provide advice and guidance so your employer prospers

tiers.name: Chancellor
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Harness

careers.name: Artist
careers.description: You possess an artistic gift, one that transcends daily life and uplifts the souls of others

tiers.name: Apprentice Artist
trappings: Brush or Chisel or Quill Pen

careers.name: Duellist
careers.description: Your blade is an instrument of justice, bound by long tradition and employed with deadly precision

tiers.name: Fencer
trappings: Sling Bag containing Clothing and 1d10 Bandages

careers.name: Envoy
careers.description: An articulate emissary, you travel far and wide, negotiating favourable pacts and treaties

careers.name: Noble
careers.description: As the scion of a noble bloodline, you stand proudly from the common rabble

tiers.name: Noble
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Harness or Coach

tiers.name: Noble Lord
trappings: 4 sets of Best Quality Courtly Garb

careers.name: Servant
careers.description: You serve the great and the good, performing tasks in support of your employer

careers.name: Spy
careers.description: You are the eyes and ears of another, exposing secrets and spreading lies

tiers.name: Informer
trappings: Sling Bag containing 2 different sets of clothing and Hooded Cloak

careers.name: Warden
careers.description: You oversee another's territory, ensuring it is properly maintained and, if necessary, protected

tiers.name: Warden
trappings: Hand Weapon or Bow with 10 arrows
Riding Horse with Saddle and Harness

careers.name: Bailiff
careers.description: Official trusted by local rulers to administer their lands efficiently and firmly

careers.name: Hedge Witch
careers.description: Wise and secretive, you guide your community using ancient magic handed down for generations

careers.name: Herbalist
careers.description: Skilled botanists who use Rhya's bounty to create cures for many ailments

tiers.name: Herb Gatherer
trappings: Sling Bag containing Assortment of Herbs

careers.name: Hunter
careers.description: Tough, independent killers who make a living off the fur and flesh of wild creatures

tiers.name: Huntsmaster
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Miner
careers.description: A hewer of stone, you pursue back-breaking work in the darkest depths of the world

careers.name: Mystic
careers.description: You have a talent for divining the future, or for convincing others you can...

careers.name: Scout
careers.description: Intrepid and resourceful, you guide others through the dangerous wilds of the Old World

tiers.name: Pathfinder
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Villager
careers.description: You are the beating heart of rural life, working the countryside to feed civilisation

careers.name: Bounty Hunter
careers.description: Ruthless and determined, you pursue your quarry to the bitter end - for justice, or for money

careers.name: Coachman
careers.description: Determined and rugged, you deliver passengers safely by coach despite the daily dangers you face

careers.name: Entertainer
careers.description: Whether high-born or low-brow, you distract people from the harsh realities of life

tiers.name: Entertainer
trappings: Selection of Scripts (that you can't yet read)

careers.name: Flagellant
careers.description: Just when you abandoned all hope, your suffering and the righteousness of Sigmar saved you!

careers.name: Messenger
careers.description: Swift and sure-footed, nothing stops you delivering your messages on time

tiers.name: Messenger
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Pedlar
careers.description: Worldly-wise and free of interference, you wander the Empire selling your wares where you will

careers.name: Road Warden
careers.description: With a wary eye and ready weapon, you tour the highways of the Empire enforcing the law

tiers.name: Road Sergeant
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Harness

careers.name: Witch Hunter
careers.description: You hunt the illegal witches plaguing the Empire by any and all means necessary

tiers.name: Witch Hunter
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Boatman
careers.description: You ply the dangerous waters of the Old World, transporting people, goods, and the latest news

careers.name: Huffer
careers.description: You pilot ships and boats through the most treacherous waters of the Old World

careers.name: Riverwarden
careers.description: Strong-backed and sure, you patrol the riverways in pursuit of lawbreakers and troublemakers

careers.name: Riverwoman
careers.description: Rivers carry most of the Old World's traffic, and you stand in the heart of that excitement

careers.name: Seaman
careers.description: A life on the ocean waves calls to you, though many Reiklander Seamen never see the sea...

careers.name: Smuggler
careers.description: You smuggle cargo, avoiding taxes and risking riverwarden inspections to secure maximum profit

careers.name: Stevedore
careers.description: You may officially load cargo for coin, but everyone knows the Stevedores rule the docklands

careers.name: Wrecker
careers.description: You lure vessels to a watery doom and make off with their cargo

tiers.name: Wrecker Captain
trappings: Fleet of Riverboats and Wrecker Crew

careers.name: Bawd
careers.description: Street-wise and mercenary, you make a living selling illicit goods in the seedier side of town

careers.name: Charlatan
careers.description: Unscrupulous and charming, you separate fools from their money; thankfully, there is no shortage of fools

tiers.name: Charlatan
trappings: Selection of Coloured Powders and Water

careers.name: Fence
careers.description: A shrewd assessor of valuables, you'll buy anything, legal or not, and turn it around for a tidy profit

careers.name: Grave Robber
careers.description: You brave the threat of necromancy, stealing from the dead to line your own pockets

careers.name: Outlaw
careers.description: You prey upon travellers, extracting a toll from the vulnerable and the unsuspecting

tiers.name: Outlaw Chief
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Racketeer
careers.description: You are part of an organised criminal gang, collecting debts and extorting money from the weak

careers.name: Thief
careers.description: You steal from others in order to line your own pockets, and you're rather good at it

careers.name: Witch
careers.description: Wilful and ambitious, you strive to master magic without an officially sanctioned licence to operate

careers.name: Cavalryman
careers.description: A dashing and fearless rider, you bring speed, versatility, and skill-at-arms to the battlefield

tiers.name: Horseman
trappings: Light Warhorse with Saddle and Tack

tiers.name: Cavalryman
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Guard
careers.description: Your job is simple, keep undesirables out

careers.name: Knight
careers.description: Thundering into battle on a heavy charger, you dominate the field, spreading fear in your wake

tiers.name: Squire
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

tiers.name: Knight of the Inner Circle
trappings: Large Unit of Knights or Several Small Units of Knights

careers.name: Pit Fighter
careers.description: You fight for money, for glory, and for the entertainment of the masses

careers.name: Protagonist
careers.description: A strong-arm for hire, you bully, fight, and maybe even kill for coin

tiers.name: Hitman
trappings: Riding Horse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Slayer
careers.description: You are rage and shame incarnate, seeking a worthy death to reclaim your lost honour

careers.name: Soldier
careers.description: You are paid to train, be disciplined, and, when the need comes, go to war

tiers.name: Officer
trappings: Light Warhorse with Saddle and Tack

careers.name: Warrior Priest
careers.description: You bring divinity to the thick of battle, slaying the enemies of the Empire with righteous fury

tiers.name: Priest Captain
trappings: Light Warhorse with Saddle and Tack
